title: Haiwang Yuan on Yuan Dynasty Secondary Q3

content.question: The expansion of the Mongol Empire led most directly to the

choices.label: spread of feudal land regulations into East Asia
fall of the European Crusader States in Syria and Palestine into Muslim hands
collapse of previously existing states, such as the Song dynasty of China
adoption of Islamic systems of rule by Arab and Turkic states in the Middle East

content.answer: collapse of previously existing states, such as the Song dynasty of China

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
